name: Walton Robinson
overview:
Based in Newcastle upon Tyne city centre, Walton Robinson is an independent estate agent that takes care of the full circle; source a property, complete inspections and viewings, complete the sale working as point of contact for all solicitors and estate agents, instruct and supervise any refurbishments or improvements required, let and manage the property and sell it if a vendor wishes to move on or cash in.

Walton Robinson recently celebrated its tenth anniversary and is ahead of schedule to manage over 350 properties and hit its £850,000 turnover target by the end of 2012. The estate agent employs 23 staff at its Haymarket head office.
